paragraphs.text:
val pclass = "\"Pclass\":" +z.select("class",Seq(("1","1"),("2","2"),("3","3")))
val sex = "\"sex\": \"" +z.select("sex",Seq(("female","female"),("male","male")))+"\""
val age = "\"age\":" +z.input("age")
val sibSp = "\"SibSp\":" +z.input("Nb frères/soeurs/épouse à bord")
val parch = "\"Parch\":" +z.input("Nb parents ou enfants à bord")
val fare = "\"Fare\":" +z.input("Tarif (entre 0 et 500)")
val embarked = "\"embarked\":\"" +z.select("Port d'embarquement",Seq(("S","Southampton"),("Q","Queenstown"),("C","Cherbourg")))+"\""

val input =sc.parallelize(Array("{"+pclass+","+sex+", "+age+", "+sibSp+", "+parch+", "+fare+", "+embarked+"}"))
val inputDF=sqlContext.read.json(input)
genModel.transform(inputDF).select("prediction").map(r=>if(r(0)==0)"Non survivant...." else "Survivant !").collect()(0)

Nb parents ou enfants à bord.name: Nb parents ou enfants à bord
